name: Airplane SWAT Team Force Elite Sniper Mission 3D Hostage
name_original: Airplane SWAT Team Force Elite Sniper Mission 3D Hostage
description:
Mayday! The terrorist group hijacked passenger aircraft on the city runway.

Play as sniper for the SWAT team and rescue hostage in this crisis situation.
The situation is getting serious the terrorist making huge demands for hostage lives.
Clear your way get on plane from stair car and get cover behind seats.
Eliminate hostile threat and kill all the terrorist with your best shooter skills.
Some terrorist got hostage on the airport runway and inside bus.
Lead your team and strike them with your modern weapons.
HD graphics and thrilling game play to enhance your gaming experience.

Download and show your amazing shooting skills in this FPS game.


Give us feedback with comments so we can make more action packed games to entertain you.
